explanation: The majority of live chat participants express bullish sentiment for BTC, citing large buy orders ($14B), expectations of breaking all-time highs, and visible support and positive momentum. Multiple users mention 'pump', 'bullish', and holding long positions, and there is specific rejection of shorting BTC at this time. Sentiment is reinforced by comments like 'only up', '120k here we go', and 'glad I held onto this long.'
